item.title: Coolstuff
item.description: Cool Stuff This is where some of the cool stuff I am working on will be posted.

item.title: About
item.description: A Mechanical Engineer by training, I hold a Ph.D. focused on Experimental Combustion research. I currently work at Eriez Manufacturing as an R&D Digital Signal Processing Engineer and have experience working as a Process Engineer at Intel Corporation. Through the academic and industry roles that I have navigated so far, I have developed a strong skill set in experimental research, metrology, and advanced data analysis methods. My recent interests include: • Digital image and signal processing methods • Statistical data analysis, probabilistic modeling, computational problem solving • Laser diagnostics/metrology and imaging techniques • The art of espresso
